message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $11,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $14,000 is my ideal price point, I could be persuaded to come down to $13,000.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice. How about we split the difference and settle at $12,000?
